text: pitabrakd nasa yeung ban phdal vea hi aoy anak( mou ha- meat) dauchdel yeung ban phdal vea hi tow aoy nuoh ning banda na pi banteabpi keat haey yeung ban phdal vea hi tow aoy ai pr hi m ai sma ai l ai sa hak yea k kaub ning banda kaunchaw robsa keat ning ai sa ai yaub you nousa ha roun haeyning saou lai mean . haey yeung kaban phdal kompir hsaa puor aoy da vou d phng der
